function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Parasite resistance to drugs and mosquito resistance to insecticides","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on insecticide-based control","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indiscriminate use of ddt for malaria control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of residual insecticides","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pitching camps near refuse, debris, and loose rocks","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spraying chemicals around tents and buildings","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Habitat destruction","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of traps and targets for pest control","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anopheles gambiae eradication","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High population densities of ae. aegypti in rio de janeiro","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Game destruction in southern rhodesia for tsetse control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of mosquito-borne diseases like malaria and yellow fever due to standing water and unsanitary living conditions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High human toxicity and ecological concerns from the use of paris green for larviciding.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vector control tools implemented for malaria","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreaks of yellow fever and malaria taking the lives of us soldiers in cuba","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on labor-intensive environmental control measures for vbd control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of housing improvements for vbd prevention","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of historical vector control knowledge","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of environmental management","category":"Nature","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insect-borne diseases like malaria, hat, leishmaniasis, lf, and onchocerciasis may spread due to ineffective vector control methods.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of gene drive mosquitoes could lead to unintended consequences in the ecosystem, such as the decline of other species or the emergence of new diseases.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Release of wolbachia-carrying mosquitoes could unintentionally introduce new pathogens or disrupt the balance of existing microbial communities in the environment.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of spatial repellents in combating vector-borne diseases could lead to the development of resistance in mosquito populations, rendering the repellents ineffective.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chemical-based vector control tools may lead to environmental contamination and harm non-target species.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of vaccines for diseases like dengue due to safety concerns may hinder effective disease control and prevention.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Genetic manipulation of mosquitoes and other novel vector control tools may have unintended consequences on ecosystems and biodiversity.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of vector-borne diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Co-endemicity of multiple vector-borne diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices in food trucks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in food trucks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions from local schools and communities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of coronavirus-related medical waste","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of face masks made from coffee","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare facilities and response protocols for disease outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the food truck environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread in service ecosystems and local communities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long lines of people waiting for food","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in service ecosystems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dj playing music while serving food and drinks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enabling improvised practices in the servicescape","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited dine-in options and restrictive social distancing rules","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited physical locations may lead to overcrowding and congestion in the area, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited food truck capacity leading to scarcity of popular food proximity of food trucks at local events increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited dining options at the local university due to
